external_games.name: Uwasa no Midori-kun!! Futari no Midori!?

name: Uwasa no Midori-kun!! Futari no Midori!?
storyline: You take control of Midori. She is actually a girl, but she joins a boy's high school without telling her secret to anybody. One day, Midori and her friends carry out a training camp for a next soccer game. But, she meets Tsukasa, her first lover, there, and their checkered school life begins...
summary: Uwasa no Midori-kun!! Futari no Midori!? is the second game based off the manga Uwasa no Midori-kun.
